trans-unit.source: Contains event arguments for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> activity handlers called at initialization of child <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> instances in addition to when the child <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> instances are finished.
trans-unit.target: Contém os argumentos do evento para os manipuladores de atividade <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> chamados na inicialização de instâncias filho de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> e também quando as instâncias filho de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> são concluídas.

trans-unit.source: Object instance that represents the data/execution context associated with the current child <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> instance executed through the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Instância do objeto que representa o contexto de dados/de execução associado à instância filho de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> atual executada por meio do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Child <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> instance that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> filho da instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> atual que acionou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorChildEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorChildEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child/template <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> instance that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> de modelo/filho da instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> que acionou o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> class instance that represents the child activity of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> instância da classe que representa a atividade filho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> enumerable collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item atual na coleção enumerável <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The current item in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> enumerable collection.
trans-unit.target: O item atual no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity" /> coleção enumerável.

trans-unit.source: The data for this item is frequently used to initialize values in the data context of the current child activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para este item frequentemente são usados para inicializar valores no contexto de dados da instância de atividade filho atual.
